HC-BP-250a.5Number of FDA enforcement actions taken 
in response to violations of current Good 
Manufacturing Practices (cGMP), by type0 
 
As of December 2021, no known FDA 
enforcement actions have been taken in 
response to violations of current Good 
Manufacturing Practices (cGMP). We outline  
compliance planning  with cGMP for future 
candidates in 2021 10-K2021 10-K, p. 23
